revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Tin Tower |image = [[File:Tin Tower.png]] |caption = An inside view of Tin Tower. |tokens = 4,500 |location = Northeast of Ecruteak City. }} '''Tin Tower''' is a dungeon in [[Johto]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 88,500 |- | Boss || 320,000 |- | Ho-oh || 610,000 |}
===Pokémon===
* Rattata * Gastly * Raticate (boss) * Haunter (boss) * Ho-oh (boss) *Requires Suicune, Raikou, and Entei, the Johto [[Roaming Pokémon]]
===Items===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 33% |- | [[XClick|xClick]] || 33% |- | [[Item Magnet]] || 33% |}
